## WebshellInvariantProps.webshellAnimatedHeight property

When this value is truthy, the `WebView` will be wrapped with an `Animated.View` container and any content size change will trigger a height animation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
webshellAnimatedHeight?: Animated.Value | null;
```
